data: NICU Glucagon Administration for the Management of Persistent Hypoglycemia (Module)
Refer to Hypoglycemia Algorithm: Infant with Persistent Hypoglycemia Requiring Glucagon for Management
Consider starting glucagon if required Glucose Infusion Rate (GIR) was greater than 12 mg/kg/min during glucose stabilization
glucagon NEO continuous infusion (40 mcg/mL) in D5W 25 mL
Select glucagon bolus only during emergency rescue and/or consultation with Endocrinology
30 mcg/kg, IV, once, drug form: kit
Blood, Urgent, Unit collect, Collection: T;N, once
Whole Blood, Urgent, Unit collect, Collection: T;N, once
Whole Blood, Urgent, Collection: T;N, once
Blood, Urgent, Unit collect, Collection: T;N, once
Blood, Timed, Unit collect, Collection: T+1;N, once
Blood, Timed, Unit collect, Collection: T;N, q12h interval for 2 days
